A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot holes. Too many jokes trying to compete with marvel or other superhero movies in those terms. Luke's character was destroyed and Leia scene was one of the worst ideas in star wars. Obviously Disney doesn't care. Kids enjoyed it and that is all that matters for them because it represents revenue. What George Lucas created was destroyed. I think it competes with the phantom menace as the worst star wars movie.
